inclusion.criterion: test in comparison to the most reliable standard tools
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all post neurosurgical patients with suspect infection or fever
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: CSF samples were collected and kept frozen from patients (N=20) that were diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease at the Memory Clinic, Skåne University Hospital in Malmö.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Burkitt's lymphoma and a large pericardial effusion. They have a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN, and past medical history of viral encephalitis/meningitis.
